entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Quispamsis
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, 8.4°C
entry.summary:

Pressure / Tendency: 100.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %
Dewpoint: 2.7°C
Wind: W 18 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Freezing rain mixed with snow. Low zero.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Freezing rain or snow at times mixed with rain beginning overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low zero. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Ice pellets mixed with snow. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or snow at times mixed with rain changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 4 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 16 February 2023
